issue.title: [Python] Correct flake8 errors in benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2394](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2394). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix linting issues that that flake8 can be ran for all files in the Python directory.

 

![https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2118138/38217076-f08a67da-369a-11e8-8166-b3a9ed7d9a60.png](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2118138/38217076-f08a67da-369a-11e8-8166-b3a9ed7d9a60.png)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2394?focusedCommentId=16474310) by Aart Goossens (aartgoossens):*
I started working on this issue. Created a PR here: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2042

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2394?focusedCommentId=16510192) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Taking care of this in ARROW-2395

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2394?focusedCommentId=17585853) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
